business.headline: New Income Tax bill explained: What's changing and what's notNew Income Tax bill: It aims to simplify the existing Income Tax Act, 1961, by making it more structured and easier to understand. If passed, the new law will come into effect from April 1, 2026.

EPFO likely to maintain 8.25% interest rate on PF deposits EPFO interest rate: In 2024-25, EPFO processed over 50.8 million claims worth Rs 2.05 lakh crore when compared to 44.5 million claims amounting to Rs 1.82 lakh crore settled in the previous year, as per the official data.

Adani Green Energy exits Sri Lanka wind power deal; stock down 1%Adani Green Energy shares: As per the agreement with Sri Lanka, Adani Green was to construct two wind power projects in Mannar town and Pooneryn village, both located in the northern province of the country.

Sensex, Nifty erase gains to end lower as IT stocks weigh in on stock marketsThe S&P BSE Sensex was down by 32.11 points to close at 76,138.97, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 13.85 points to end at 23,031.40.

Finance Minister Nirmala SItharaman introduces new Income Tax Bill in Lok SabhaFinance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman tabled the new Income Tax bill in Lok Sabha amid the huge uproar by the opposition MPs. The bill will now be referred to the Select Committee of Lok Sabha for further review.
New Income Tax Bill tabled in Lok Sabha, faces select panel reviewThe government, in a bid to simplify the present Income Tax Act, 1961, has introduced a new income tax bill in Parliament today.

Explained: Why are large-cap mutual funds back in demandWith small-cap and mid-cap stocks experiencing corrections, investors are moving towards large-cap funds, which are considered safer and more stable in volatile times.

Quality Power IPO: 10 things investors must know before subscribing Quality Power Electrical Equipments Limited offers high-voltage electrical equipment and solutions for grid connectivity and energy transition.

New Income Tax Bill: How will it make taxpayers' lives simpler?The new income tax bill would be almost half of the current law, as the existing Income Tax Act,1961 contained 880 pages when it came into existence.
Sensex gains 500 points: 3 reasons why stock market is rising todayAs of 10:48 AM, the S&P BSE Sensex was up 47.85 points at 76,644.93, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 137.75 points to 23,183.00.

Sensex, Nifty open higher as cooling inflation boosts market sentimentShare Market Today: The S&P BSE Sensex was up 163.21 points to 76,334.39, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 46.25 points to 23,091.50 as of 9:30 AM.

Ajax Engineering IPO: Check allotment status, listing date and latest GMPAjax Engineering IPO allotment status: The IPO price band was set at Rs 599 to Rs 629 per share. The minimum lot size for the application was 23 shares. For retail investors, the minimum investment required was Rs 13,777.

entertainment.headline: Sanya Malhotra's Mrs. makes questions on marital rape, mechanical sex personalImagine a woman bleeding for five days in a month, and those five days being the most peaceful in her life because she can finally refuse sex to her husband. He can't assert his power over her. That's how Sanya Malhotra's 'Mrs.' unsettles you and makes you think.

Singer-composer Vishal Dadlani meets with an accident, undergoes treatmentVishal Dadlani of the Vishal-Sheykhar duo is undergoing treatment after an accident, leading to the postponement of their upcoming concert scheduled for March 2.

Not just Gujarat, all Samay Raina shows cancelled amid India's Got Latent rowSamay Raina's shows in India have been cancelled following controversy around India's Got Latent, with Gujarat shows being the first to be affected.

Singer Jonita Gandhi to perform at Lollapalooza India, will open for Shawn MendesJonita Gandhi will perform at Lollapalooza India on March 8, opening for Shawn Mendes. Her latest single Channa has also been nominated for a Juno Award.

Twilight star Taylor Lautner to return as werewolf in self-aware werewolf seriesTwilight star Taylor Lautner is returning to portray a werewolf in the self-aware Amazon series. Details of the show are yet to be revealed.

Anupamaa actor Rupali Ganguly seeks blessings at Maha KumbhActor Rupali Ganguly visited Maha Kumbh in Prayagraj with her family. She shared moments from her spiritual visit, including performing aarti, attending a hawan, and meeting a saint.

Nawazuddin Siddiqui begins Raat Akeli Hai 2 shooting in LucknowActor Nawazuddin Siddiqui has begun Raat Akeli Hai 2 shooting in Lucknow. The actor will be seen sharing screen space with Chitragandha Singh.

Olivia Swann on NCIS: Sydney, her character's growth & challenges In this exclusive interview with India Today's Bhavna Agarwal, Olivia Swann dives deep into her role in NCIS: Sydney, sharing insights into her character's journey, development, and challenges throughout the series.

Rozlyn Khan sues Ankita Lokhande for defamation over 'cheap' remark TV actor Rozlyn Khan took legal action against Ankita Lokhande's recent comments. Ankita had called her 'cheap', for her claims about Hina Khan's cancer battle.

Jackson Wang makes a powerful comeback with High Alone from Magic Man 2Jackson Wang drops a new single, High Alone, that marks the beginning of his new album, MAGIC MAN 2. The album promises a deep dive into themes of identity and personal transformation, set against a backdrop of atmospheric production and introspective lyrics.

Actor John Lithgow approached to play Albus Dumbledore in Harry Potter seriesAward-winning American actor John Lithgow has reportedly been approached to play the iconic character of Hogwarts principal Albus Dumbledore in HBO's Harry Potter series.

Rupali Ganguly's stepdaughter calls her 'evil step lady', issues clarificationRupali Ganguly's stepdaughter, Esha Verma, clarified her viral social media post against the actor. Esha requested privacy.

general news.headline: 26/11 plotter extradition, F-35 jets, trade deal: Takeaways from Modi-Trump meetModi-Trump meet: The key takeaways from the Modi-Trump meeting were the extradition of 26/11 Mumbai terror attack accused Tahawwur Rana to India and the F-35 jet deal.

Trump clears 26/11 plotter Tahawwur Rana's extradition: Giving violent man backUS President Donald Trump announced the approval of 26/11 Mumbai terror attack convict Tahawwur Rana's extradition to India, stating he will face justice.

Not neutral, we stand for peace: PM Modi on Russia-Ukraine war at Trump meet  Live UpdatesAfter talks with US President Donald Trump at the White House, Prime Minister Narendra Modi said that India is not neutral in conflicts and firmly stands for peace, asserting that this is not an era of war.

US to make wonderful trade deals for India, says Trump as he meets PM ModiUS President Donald Trump welcomed Prime Minister Modi to the White House hours after he announced reciprocal tariffs that levies tariffs on US imports.

MAGA + MIGA = MEGA partnership, says PM Modi as India, US vow to boost tradePrime Minister Narendra Modi, during his official two-day visit to the US, said that India is moving towards MIGA (Make India Great Again), which is his version of MAGA (Make America Great Again).

Trump declares reciprocal tariffs: Whatever countries charge US, we charge themDonald Trump announced reciprocal tariffs, vowing to match duties imposed on American goods. The policy, which he said was aimed at fairness, could take effect within weeks, impacting global trade, including high tariff rates for India.

Elon with 3 Musk-eteers at meeting with PM ModiTech titan Elon Musk met Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Thursday at the Blair House. Several videos surfaced online, showing Musk's children seated attentively as their father engaged with the Indian Prime Minister.

India swept into Donald Trump's trade war: 'They charge more tariffs than most'Just hours before his meeting with Prime Minister Narendra Modi, US President Donald Trump announced his decison to impose reciprocal tariffs, adding that no exemptions would be made for any country.

Chhaava review: Vicky Kaushal's film growls, but doesn't roarReleased-Fri Feb 14, 2025Chhaava movie review: Director Laxman Utekar's Chhaava, starring Vicky Kaushal and Rashmika Mandanna, is based on the life of Maratha King Chhatrapati Sambhaji Maharaj. Brilliant Vicky Kaushal uplifts this strenuous film, says our review.

Kerala's Rs 1,000-crore half-price scam: Victims explain how they got dupedIn one of the biggest scams in Kerala, a 26-year-old graduate duped 40,000 people across the state with a Ponzi-style network, offering scooters, mobiles, laptops and other household items at half their price. This is how Ananthu Krishnan pulled off the state-wide Rs 1,000-crore scam.

Donald Trump bats for Russia's return to G7: Was mistake to expel themRussia had been a member of the G7, then known as the G8, until Moscow was excluded following its annexation of Ukraine's Crimea region in 2014.

In pics: PM Modi at White House, holds bilateral talks with US President TrumpPrime Minister Narendra Modi on Thursday held bilateral talks with US President Donald Trump at the White House. The two leaders discussed a host of issues of mutual interest, including trade, tariffs on imports, energy, defence and security, technological partnership and strategic cooperation.

What to do when your in-laws pressure you about kids - even in 2025It's 2025, but some people are still stuck with the idea that all married couples, whether they want kids or not, should have them. But with DINK (Dual Income, No Kids) couples at an all-time high, how can you tackle the family pressure with the utmost subtlety?

Trump, Elon Musk bash Reuters over government 'social deception' contractElon Musk sparked the controversy on social media, suggesting that Reuters was paid by the US government to engage in "social deception". Trump followed up with a demand that the company return the funds.

What led to imposition of President's Rule in Manipur?Despite having long meetings with state BJP leaders, party state in-charge Sambit Patra could not zero in on and propose any name to Governor Ajay Kumar Bhalla, even after meeting him twice within 12 hours earlier this week.

Trump says US to boost military sales to India, plans F-35 jet dealDonald Trump did not provide a timeline, but foreign military sales, especially for cutting-edge technology like the stealthy F-35 jet, typically take years to work through.

PM's back-to-back meets with NSA Waltz, Elon Musk, Vivek Ramaswamy. See picsPrime Minister Narendra Modi held a bilateral meeting with Tesla CEO Elon Musk and US National Security Advisor Michael Waltz at Blair House in Washington.

2nd flight with Indians deported from US to land in Amritsar on Saturday: SourcesA second flight carrying Indians deported from the US is likely to land in Amritsar on February 15. Sources said that another flight carrying illegal Indian immigrants is likely to arrive after that.

PM Modi, Trump discuss tariffs, to pursue mutually beneficial trade dealIn their bilateral talks at the White House, Prime Minister Narendra Modi and US President Donald Trump reportedly discussed the US's reciprocal tariff in detail, addressing market access concerns and overcapacity issues.
The post-Budget agenda: How to make GST 'Good and Simple Tax'The Goods and Services Tax (GST), introduced in 2017, has been good intention undone by poor implementation. How can it be reformed?

IPL: Did Virat Kohli say no to returning as RCB captain for 2025 season?IPL 2025: After retiring from T20Is last year, Virat Kohli was widely expected to return as RCB captain. However, on February 13, the franchise appointed Rajat Patidar as their skipper for the upcoming season.

US Senate confirms Robert F Kennedy Jr as Health SecretaryThe confirmation paves the way for Robert F Kennedy to be sworn in to lead the massive Department of Health and Human Services, overseeing multiple high-profile agencies.

Singer-composer Vishal Dadlani meets with an accident, undergoes treatmentVishal Dadlani of the Vishal-Sheykhar duo is undergoing treatment after an accident, leading to the postponement of their upcoming concert scheduled for March 2.

Atishi claims Delhi faced 40 power outages since AAP's poll loss, BJP retortsBJP said there is no power outage anywhere in Delhi and challenged Atishi to specify which areas of Delhi are experiencing power cuts instead of making "baseless" statements.

Telugu cinema's Valentine's Day 2025: Beyond controversies and classic loveThis Valentine's Day, Telugu cinema steps beyond the usual romantic cliches. While re-releases like Orange and Surya S/O Krishnan promise a nostalgic trip, new films such as Laila and Brahma Anandam explore unconventional love stories — from familial bonds to survival in disguise.

Brilliant Vicky Kaushal uplifts this strenuous film, says our review.

Empuraan producer criticises Suresh Kumar's decision for strike in MollywoodThe Kerala Film Producers' Association is embroiled in a conflict as senior producer Antony Perumbavoor criticised vice president G Suresh Kumar's strike call across Mollywood.  It intensified as Kumar questioned Mohanlal's Empuraan's budget. The film is being produced by Perumbavoor.

Emilia Perez actor Karla Sofia Gascon to skip BAFTAs amid controversyKarla Sofia Gascon will not attend the BAFTA Awards following backlash over resurfaced racist posts. She is also not on the list of attendees.

sports.headline: Champions Trophy 2025: Can Steve Smith guide depleted Australia to title glory?Australia are always considered favourites heading into ICC events, but things seem to be a little different this time. The Aussies will look for inspiration from Steve Smith and a bit of magic from their remaining ODI World Cup heroes to win the Champions Trophy for the first time since 2009.

Kohli gifts signed India jersey to Pietersen's son: Fits like a gloveVirat Kohli gifted a signed India jersey to Kevin Pietersen's son, Dylan, prompting a heartfelt Instagram post from the former England captain, who expressed gratitude for the special gesture.

Gukesh fights back to hold Firouzja in Freestyle Chess Grand SlamD Gukesh staged a remarkable comeback to secure a crucial draw against Alireza Firouzja, while Magnus Carlsen and Hikaru Nakamura dominated with black pieces in the Freestyle Chess Grand Slam Tour's final round.

WPL 2025: Squads, schedule and all you need to know WPL 2025: Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) will look to defend their title when they begin their campaign on February 14 against Gujarat Giants at the Kotambi Stadium in Vadodara. The final will take place on March 15 at the Brabourne Stadium in Mumbai.

JP Duminy backs Rohit Sharma to put up big performances in Champions TrophyFormer South Africa cricketer JP Duminy has backed India captain Rohit Sharma to put up big performances in the upcoming ICC Champions Trophy 2025. Rohit recently bounced back to form in the 2nd ODI vs England.

Pakistan hopeful of hosting more ICC events after Champions Trophy 2025Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) Chairman Mohsin Naqvi is hopeful that the upcoming ICC Champions Trophy 2025 will open opportunities to host more ICC events in the future.

Babar Azam not in form? Pakistan captain backs star batter with interesting takeODI tri-series final: Speaking on the eve of the final, Pakistan captain Mohammad Rizwan defended Babar Azam, saying the star batter is facing additional pressure because of 'extreme expectations'. Babar failed in the first two matches of the series.

McCullum hits back at 'factually incorrect' criticism over England's practiceEngland head coach Brendon McCullum has hit back at the criticism over England holding fewer practice sessions during their recent white-ball series against India.

Champions Trophy: Shreyas Iyer's admission reveals India's think-tank problemWhy fix something that isn't broken? India seem to be overcomplicating their combination in the ODI series against England, which is a worrying sign ahead of the Champions Trophy. There appears to be a real problem of plenty for coach Gautam Gambhir and captain Rohit Sharma. Why on earth did they leave out Shreyas Iyer for the series opener in Nagpur? An injury to Virat Kohli meant Shreyas got an opportunity after a late phone call from the skipper. The star batter revealed he was not in the XI as late as the eve of the match.

After Champions Trophy snub, Yashasvi Jaiswal to play Ranji Trophy semifinalAfter missing out on a place in India's final 15-man squad for the Champions Trophy, Yashasvi Jaiswal was drafted into Mumbai's Ranji Trophy squad for their semi-final against Vidarbha in Nagpur.

PAK vs NZ, tri-series final Live Streaming: When and where to watch?Tri-Series in Pakistan 2025: Pakistan and New Zealand are all set to clash in the final of the tri-series on February 14 in Karachi. Here are the complete details of where to watch the match live on TV and on the internet.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
